source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.9 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 858,286.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cowl of the Swift Fox

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of the Swift Fox

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
